title: Oru Thadavai Solvaya Lyrics Vaseegara
stanzas:
<div>
<div>
Oru Thadavai Solvaya Lyrics Vaseegara

Oru thadavai solvaayaa
unnai enakku pidikkum endru.
oru paarvai paarpaayaa
unnai enakku pidikkum endru.

kadhal oru pugaiyai pola
maraithu vaithaal
therindhuvidum

kadhalil thaan pookkal modhi
malaigal kooda udainthu vidum

unnai olikkaathe
ennai vadhaikkaathe
endrum idhayathil
ilakkanam kidayaathe

nadhiyil theriyum
nilavin uruvam
nadhikku sondham illai.

ninaipathellaam
nadakkum vazhkai.
yaarukkum amaivathillai.

unakum enakkum
vizhundha mudichi
thaanaai vizhunthathillai.

ulaga urundai udaiyum podhum
kadhal udaivathillai.

minmini desathu sondhakaaran
vinmeen kaetpathu thavaraagum.

varalatril vazhkindra kadhal ellaam
valiyodu poraadum kadhal thaane.

Oru thadavai solvaayaa
unnai enakku pidikkum endru.
oru paarvai paarpaayaa
unnai enakku pidikkum endru.

nerunga ninaikkum
ninaivai marakka
nenjam ninaikkiradhu.

kanavil pookkum pookkal
parikka penmai azhaikindrathu

kilaiyai murithu potu vidalaam
vaerai enna seivaai?
tharaiyai udaithu mulaikkum podhu
anbe engu selvaai

malligai pookkal udhirvathellaam
marathadi nizhalukku sondhamillai
unnodu naan vazha poraaduven
nee indri ponaalo thallaaduven.

Oru thadavai solvaayaa
unnai enakku pidikkum endru.
oru paarvai paarpaayaa
unnai enakku pidikkum endru.

kadhal oru pugaiyai pola
maraithu vaithaal
therindhuvidum

kadhalil thaan pookkal modhi
malaigal kooda udainthu vidum

unnai olikkaathe
ennai vadhaikkaathe
endrum idhayathil
ilakkanam kidayaathe
